string.text: A clan wishes to join your kingdom!

The {JOINING_CLAN.NAME} clan is looking to join your kingdom{?JOINING_CLAN.UNDER_CONTRACT} as mercenary{?}{\?}! They have {TROOPS_DESCRIPTION} and {FIEFS_DESCRIPTION}. Their leader {RELATION} towards you. What say ye?
{FIEFS} {?FIEFS.PLURAL_FORM}fiefs{?}fief{\?} that they {?AT_WAR}will{?}won't be able to{\?} bring with them
Enables a variety of tweaks regarding clans migration between kingdoms. Due to the nature of these changes, they always apply to every clan in the game.
Specify if AI clans should consider player kingdom when they are deciding which kingdom to join or defect to.
Specify if AI clans should consider player kingdom when they are deciding which kingdom to join as mercenaries.

Specify if AI clans should always pick the most attractive kingdom instead of a random one when considering joining some kingdom or defecting. Enabling this can potentially increase intensity of clan migration between kingdoms.
